nodes.text: Trellev Aquem was a male individual who served as a senator in the Imperial Senate on the planet Coruscant during the early years of the Galactic Empire. Aquem secretly received bribes from the Pyke Syndicate, an underworld criminal organization, and after he accidentally discovered that his Bothan senatorial aide Jovel Nial had a talent for slicing, he put her talents to use in service to the Pykes.
